quotes.quote: The only jewel which will not decay is knowledge.
Adversity is the diamond dust Heaven polishes its jewels with.
Sweet are the uses of adversity which, like the toad, ugly and venomous, wears yet a precious jewel in his head.
The most precious jewels are not made of stone, but of flesh.
Jewel of life, guiding light, heralding a joyous new dawn.
What a wonderful phenomenon it is, carefully considered, when the human eye, that jewel of organic structures, concentrates its moist brilliance on another human creature!
Their stud got hot and that hurt us.
Sense shines with a double luster when it is set in humility. An able yet humble man is a jewel worth a kingdom.
Everlasting life is a jewel of too great a value to be purchased by the wealth of this world.
Consistency is a jewel, but too much jewelry is vulgar.
There is no jewel in the world so valuable as a chaste and virtuous woman.
Jewels five-words-long, That on the stretch'd forefinger of all Time Sparkle forever.
The brightest ornaments in the crown of the blessed in heaven are the sufferings which they have borne patiently on earth.
The diamond of character is revealed by the concussion of misfortune, as the splendor of the precious jewel of the mine is developed by the blows of the lapidary.
Truth is a jewel which should not be painted over; but it may be set to advantage and shown in a good light.
These gems have life in them: their colors speak, say what words fail of.
If a guy's a stud, then he's a stud when he comes home, provided he has enough time to get himself back in shape.
Ornament is but the guiled shore to a most dangerous sea.
Its always nice to have a stud muffin at the table.
Jewelry maybe is more expensive than clothes, but clothes are more important than jewelry.
A thoroughly honest man is a rare jewel in the shallow stream of meaningless pebbles.
The most expensive jewels are not found around our necks, but in our hearts.
Precious jewel, you glow, you shine, reflecting all the good things in the world. Just look at yourself.
The ornaments of our homes are the friends that visit it.
Rings and jewels are not gifts, but apologies for gifts. The only true gift is a portion of thyself
Your mind is a key, and whatever it unlocks, the greatest treasure of all.
Women should not be allowed on juries where the accused is a stud.
The stud shaft was moving up and down and pumping the plaque into the tongue.
Jewels! Today each twig is important, each ring, each infection, each form is all that the gods must have meant.
